content.text: Marin is a male slave who was forced to dress as a mermaid by his owner.

Marin is a large, overweight man. He dresses like a woman due to being forced, with long blonde hair and makeup. He has stubble around his mouth and sports a swimsuit that covers his chest. He wore a fake mermaid tail, and had a slave chain around his neck.
Marin seemed quite tired and distressed while swimming in his aquarium-like cell, since he is not a real mermaid and can not survive in water.

Sometime before he was presented to Luffy, Hatchan, and Pappag while they were searching slave shops for Camie, he was captured by slavers and became a slave. Marin was restrained by a chain collar and could barely swim in his aquarium-like cell.

elements.text: Marin is a French word that translates to sailor, or "from the sea".
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 51 Chapter 500 (p. 7) and Episode 394.
↑  Vivre Card - One Piece Visual Dictionary, Marin's birthday is given.
